name: next-intl-hlpr
description: Highlights missing translations in next-intl JSON files and shows missing languages on hover

nextIntlHlpr.translationsFolder.description: Path to the folder containing translation files (relative to workspace root). Supports single files per language (e.g., messages/en.json) or subfolders (e.g., messages/en/common.json).

nextIntlHlpr.translationsMode.description: Preferred mode for translation files. 'auto' detects based on folder contents, 'single-file' expects one JSON file per language (e.g., en.json), 'folder' expects language subfolders with JSON files (e.g., en/common.json).
